snippet.title: "Amber Slept Her Way To The Top" Emilia Clarke Reveals How Amber Heard Got The Part In Aquaman!
snippet.description:
Emilia Clarke Revals Shocking News That The Only Reason Amber Heard Was In Aquaman Is Because She Slept With...

✅ Subscribe & HIT that notification bell for more Celebrity Content!

Ever since the Johnny Depp and Amber Heard scandal began, fans have been taking sides and choosing who they want to support in the legal battles. At first, everyone was on Ambers side, supporting her story but now it seems the tables have turned.

Fans of Johnny have started a change.org petition to have Amber Heard removed from her role as Mera in Aquaman 2 and over 1.8 million people have signed the petition and the number just keeps rising! However, after the pandemic started last year, many movies and releases have been postponed and filmings have been rescheduled due to their inability to play in theaters, comic book movies were particularly impacted by this. But it seems that things are looking better in 2021 and movies will go back to resume filming and appear in theaters this year. Which begs the question, who will play "Mera" in Aquaman? Will Amber continue her role, or will she be replaced by someone else?

#AmberHeard #EmiliaClarke #JohnnyDepp
